remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了盡可能有下列例外狀況符合 OLE DB 連接字串格式：The is designed to match OLE DB connection string format as closely as possible with the following exceptions: - 「 提供者 = `value` "子句是必要的。The "Provider = `value` " clause is required. 不過，您無法使用 「 提供者 = MSDASQL"因為.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 不支援 OLE DB Provider for ODBC (MSDASQL)。However, you cannot use "Provider = MSDASQL" because the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB does not support the OLE DB Provider for ODBC (MSDASQL). 若要存取 ODBC 資料來源，請使用內的物件命名空間。To access ODBC data sources, use the object that is in the namespace. - 不同於 ODBC 或 ADO，連接字串，則會傳回等同於使用者設定，安全性資訊減如果`Persist Security Info`設`false`（預設值）。Unlike ODBC or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set , minus security information if `Persist Security Info` is set to `false` (default). .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 不會保存或傳回連接字串中的密碼，除非您將設定`Persist Security Info`關鍵字`true`（不建議）。The .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set the `Persist Security Info` keyword to `true` (not recommended). 為了維持高層級的安全性，強烈建議您使用`Integrated Security`關鍵字搭配`Persist Security Info`設`false`。To maintain a high level of security, it is strongly recommended that you use the `Integrated Security` keyword with `Persist Security Info` set to `false`. 您可以使用內容，連接至各種資料來源。You can use the property to connect to a variety of data sources. 下列範例說明幾個可能的連接字串。The following example illustrates several possible connection strings. ``` "Provider=MSDAORA; Data Source=ORACLE8i7;Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=Yes" "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0; Data Source=c:\bin\LocalAccess40.mdb" "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=(local);Integrated Security=SSPI" ``` 如果`Data Source`關鍵字未指定連接字串中，提供者會嘗試連接到本機伺服器，如果有的話。If the `Data Source` keyword is not specified in the connection string, the provider will try to connect to the local server if one is available. 如需連接字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[Using Connection String Keywords with SQL Server Native Client](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=126696)。For more information about connection strings, see [Using Connection String Keywords with SQL Server Native Client](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=126696). 連接關閉時，才可以設定屬性。The property can be set only when the connection is closed. 許多連接字串值都有對應的唯讀屬性。Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties. 當連接字串設定時，這些內容更新時，偵測到錯誤時除外。When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected. 在此情況下，會更新任何屬性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 屬性會傳回中所包含的那些設定。 properties return only those settings that are contained in the . 重設關閉的連接會重設所有的連接字串值和相關的屬性。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values and related properties. 這包括密碼。This includes the password. 比方說，如果您設定連接字串，包含"Initial Catalog = AdventureWorks"，然後重設連接字串 」 提供者 = SQLOLEDB; 資料來源 = MySQLServer; IntegratedSecurity = SSPI"，則屬性不再設定為AdventureWorks。For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Initial Catalog= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Provider= SQLOLEDB;Data Source= MySQLServer;IntegratedSecurity=SSPI", the property is no longer set to AdventureWorks. (連接字串的初始目錄值對應至`Database`屬性。)(The Initial Catalog value of the connection string corresponds to the `Database` property.) 當屬性設定，會執行初步驗證的連接字串。A preliminary validation of the connection string is performed when the property is set. 如果值`Provider`， `Connect Timeout`， `Persist Security Info`，或`OLE DB Services`會包含在字串中，會檢查這些值。If values for the `Provider`, `Connect Timeout`, `Persist Security Info`, or `OLE DB Services` are included in the string, these values are checked. 當應用程式呼叫方法中，連接字串已經過完整驗證。When an application calls the method, the connection string is fully validated. 如果連接字串包含無效或不支援內容中，執行階段例外狀況，例如，就會產生。If the connection string contains invalid or unsupported properties, a run-time exception, such as , is generated. > [!CAUTION] > 可提供連接資訊在通用資料連結 (UDL) 檔案中; 但是您應該避免這樣。It is possible to supply connection information for an in a Universal Data Link (UDL) file; however you should avoid doing so. UDL 檔案不會加密，並公開連接字串資訊以純文字。UDL files are not encrypted and expose connection string information in clear text. 因為對您的應用程式而言，UDL 檔是外部的檔案型資源，所以您無法使用 .NET Framework 來保護該檔案。Because a UDL file is an external file-based resource to your application, it cannot be secured using the .NET Framework. 連接字串的基本格式包含一系列以分號隔開的關鍵字/值組。The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要加入包含分號、 單引號字元或雙引號字元的值，值必須括在雙引號中。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 如果值包含分號和雙引號字元，該值可括在單引號中。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks. 單一引號也很有用，如果值以雙引號字元開頭的。The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character. 相反地，如果值以單引號開始，可以使用雙引號。Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark. 如果值包含單引號和雙引號字元，用來括住值的引號字元必須加倍，每次出現的值內。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation-mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value. 若要包含上述或尾端空格的字串值中，值必須括在單引號或雙引號括住。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks. 會忽略任何開頭或尾端空格，整數、 布林值或列舉的值的周圍，即使以引號括住。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks. 不過，在字串常值關鍵字或值的空格會保留。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 單引號或雙引號可能使用的連接字串內使用的分隔符號 (例如，`Data Source= my'Server`或`Data Source= my"Server`) 除非引號字元是在值中的第一個或最後一個字元。Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, `Data Source= my'Server` or `Data Source= my"Server`) unless a quotation-mark character is the first or last character in the value. 若要包含等號 （=） 中的關鍵字或值，它必須加上另一個等號。To include an equal sign (=) in a keyword or value, it must be remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的 ADO.NET 2.0 是支援的使用編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體， **EnlistTransaction**利用中的可用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易，因此最好**EnlistDistributedTransaction**針對此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 您可以繼續登記在現有的分散式的交易使用方法如果停用了自動登記。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在現有的分散式交易中登記可確保，如果認可或回復交易，在資料來源的程式碼所做的修改也認可或回復的。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 如需有關分散式交易的詳細資訊，請參閱[分散式交易](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 如果傳回的例外狀況已經開始交易使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 不過，交易是否在資料來源上啟動本機交易 (例如，藉由明確執行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 陳述式使用物件)，復原本機交易並登記在現有做為要求的分散式的交易。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您不會收到通知，本機交易已回復，而且會負責管理任何本機的交易未啟動使用。You won't receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReleaseObjectPool` 可以呼叫其他狀況會保留針對集區的可用資源物件。`ReleaseObjectPool` can be called to free resources that would otherwise be reserved for pooled objects. 您可以呼叫這個方法，如果比方說，不會使用連接物件的 OLE DB 服務通常會保留共用的連接使用中的時間長度的一次。You might want to call this method if, for example, the connection object will not be used again for the amount of time that OLE DB services ordinarily keeps pooled connections active. 請注意，單獨呼叫此方法不會實際釋放存在於集區中的使用中連接。Note that calling the method alone does not actually release the active connections that exist in the pool. 下列之前必須達到最後處置該集區：The following must occur before the pool is finally disposed: 1. 呼叫連接物件傳回至集區。Call to return the connection object to the pool. 2. 允許的逾時時間之集區的每個連接物件。Allow each connection object to time out of the pool. 3. 呼叫 。Call . 4. 叫用記憶體回收。Invoke garbage collection. 相反地，如果您呼叫上所有使用中連接，並叫用記憶體回收，但沒有呼叫，依然會有效管理的集區的物件保留的資源。Conversely, if you call on all active connections, and invoke garbage collection, but do not call , the resources reserved for the pooled objects will remain available. ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 開啟它、 顯示的某些屬性，會關閉連線，並釋放物件集區，以節省資源。The following example creates an , opens it, displays some of its properties, closes the connection, and releases the object pool to conserve resources.
